name: Too Small to Cookie
description:
Turns out you're short. Sometimes you want cookies. 

My friends are the real cookies. Glad to have the nice conversation while creating the game... Even though they are cookies.

How many cookies do you think I could cookie in this this cookielishous description?

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E/Left Click - pick up/drop

Scroll wheel - move objects away from/towards you
